statements: SELECT * FROM Signature_Template;
SELECT id, individual_id FROM Signature_Template WHERE individual_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT individual_id, signature_image FROM Signature_Template ORDER BY individual_id ASC;
SELECT id, signature_image FROM Signature_Template WHERE id IN ('123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000', '223e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000');
SELECT * FROM Signature_Template WHERE individual_id IS NOT NULL AND signature_image IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM Signature_Template WHERE individual_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT id FROM Signature_Template WHERE signature_image IS NOT NULL;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Signature_Template WHERE id IN ('123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000', '987e6543-e21b-34c5-d678-789456784321');
SELECT * FROM Signature_Template ORDER BY individual_id ASC;
SELECT id, signature_image FROM Signature_Template WHERE individual_id = '246e1357-a12b-34c6-d789-987654321000' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM Individuals WHERE birth_date < '1990-01-01';
SELECT individual_id, full_name FROM Individuals WHERE individual_id = 'ce01137e-d90c-450f-bd3b-0da5fa9c54e6';
SELECT full_name, birth_date FROM Individuals WHERE full_name LIKE '%Smith%';
SELECT * FROM SignatureTemplates WHERE signature_id = 'aee26da4-1f65-445c-9f01-6fd10a920a4f';
SELECT individual_id, signature_id FROM Individuals WHERE full_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM SignatureTemplates WHERE individual_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
SELECT individual_id, template_data FROM SignatureTemplates WHERE signature_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' ORDER BY individual_id DESC
SELECT full_name, birth_date FROM Individuals WHERE birth_date > '1990-01-01' AND full_name LIKE '%John%'
SELECT * FROM Individuals WHERE signature_id IS NOT NULL AND birth_date BETWEEN '1980-01-01' AND '2000-01-01'
SELECT individual_id, full_name FROM Individuals WHERE full_name = 'Alice' OR birth_date < '1970-01-01' ORDER BY birth_date ASC
SELECT * FROM SignatureTemplate;
SELECT name, signature_image FROM SignatureTemplate WHERE id = 1;
SELECT individual_id, full_name FROM Individual ORDER BY full_name DESC;
SELECT recognition_id, accuracy_score FROM RecognitionAccuracy WHERE accuracy_score > 90;
SELECT individual_id, full_name, date_of_birth FROM Individual WHERE date_of_birth BETWEEN '1990-01-01' AND '2000-12-31';
SELECT * FROM SignatureTemplate;
SELECT name, signature_image FROM SignatureTemplate WHERE id = 1;
SELECT individual_id, full_name, date_of_birth FROM Individual ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT recognition_id, accuracy_score FROM RecognitionAccuracy WHERE accuracy_score > 80;
SELECT Individual.full_name, RecognitionAccuracy.accuracy_score FROM Individual JOIN RecognitionAccuracy ON Individual.individual_id = RecognitionAccuracy.individual_id;
SELECT * FROM individuals;
SELECT id, name, age FROM individuals WHERE age > 30;
SELECT template_name, template_data FROM signature_templates WHERE individual_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
SELECT individual_id, accuracy_score FROM recognition_accuracy ORDER BY accuracy_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM recognition_logs WHERE log_timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM signature_templates WHERE individual_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT template_name, template_data FROM signature_templates WHERE template_name LIKE '%John%';
SELECT id, template_name, template_data->'field' AS field_value FROM signature_templates WHERE template_data->>'field' = 'value';
SELECT * FROM individuals WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT individual_id, AVG(accuracy_score) AS avg_score FROM recognition_accuracy GROUP BY individual_id HAVING AVG(accuracy_score) > 0.8 ORDER BY avg_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM signatures;
SELECT user_id, signature_data FROM signatures WHERE id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM users ORDER BY last_name ASC, first_name DESC;
SELECT user_id, accuracy_score FROM recognition_accuracy WHERE accuracy_score > 0.9;
SELECT id, recognition_time FROM recognition_history WHERE user_id = 5 ORDER BY recognition_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM users WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT signature_data FROM signatures WHERE id = 3;
SELECT user_id, recognition_time FROM recognition_history ORDER BY recognition_time DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_id, accuracy_score FROM recognition_accuracy WHERE accuracy_score > 0.8;
